channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Adobe to buy Semrush for $1.9 billion
item.description: Adobe said it would offer $12 per share for Semrush, almost double the latter's closing price of $6.89 on Tuesday, before news of the deal.

item.title: Onepot AI raises $13M to help make chemical drug creation easier
item.description: Onepot AI is a a company that is home to the small-molecule synthesis lab POT-1.

item.title: 19 Best Mac Accessories (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From a Mac Mini hub to mechanical keyboards, these curated gadgets will upgrade your Mac-powered desktop.

item.title: Spotify’s new features let listeners explore the people and stories behind their favorite music
item.description: Spotify new features will showcase who's behind your favorite songs, how music is connected, and what inspired the tunes.

item.title: With upcoming ban, Meta begins to notify Australian teens that their accounts will be shut down
item.description: When the ban goes into effect on December 10, Meta will revoke account access for users under the age of 16 in Australia.

item.title: How Donald Trump Lost Control of the Epstein Spin Cycle
item.description: Donald Trump has spent years benefiting from the QAnon's Jeffrey Epstein obsession. That’s all changing.

item.title: The US Will Prioritize Visa Processing for Fans With World Cup Tickets
item.description: In the face of heavy travel restrictions imposed by the Trump administration, the United States announced that soccer fans going to the World Cup will...

item.title: Vasco Translator Q1 Review: Cloning Your Voice
item.description: This new real-time interpreter can change your language while cloning your voice—sort of.

item.title: Target joins OpenAI’s growing list of retail apps
item.description: OpenAI is pushing deeper into retail, with Target set to debut a new ChatGPT-powered app for shoppers. The app is launching in beta next week.

item.title: Best Gifts for Hikers, Backpackers, Outdoorsy People (2025)
item.description: Let them pick out their own hiking boots. Instead, try gifting a useful blade or a nature journal to delight your outdoorsy friend.
